original_title: มาธาดอร์จอมเพี้ยน
overview: Miguel de Cavier, a Thai-Spanish woman disguised as a man, works as a matador to pay the debts of her father, Julio, an ex-matador who is now disabled after a failed stunt. One day, Saranjit, the mother who had left her since early childhood, returns to Madrid in hope of reuniting with her daughter once again.
title: The Extraordinary Matador
